resources.string: No internet. Please check your connection and try again
Waiting time for a response has expired
The request is not registered in Diia
The requestor is not registered with Diia. To protect your personal data, we send digital copies of documents only to those who have registered with Diia.
No documents were found for your request
The request contains documents that are missing from Diia

This is required to verify documents by QR code. It is also used to compare your photo with the ones in the registers, when confirming your identity or signing documents. Diia does not store these photos.
To continue, give the Action access to the camera. You can do this in Settings.
The app needs access to the device\'s camera
Access to the camera is required

string.name: camera_permission_rationale_title
string.u: Learn more about camera access here

resources.string: The action can request access to the camera to verify documents or user data by scanning a QR code, creating a remote qualified electronic signature, identifying a person (by comparing a photo with the Unified Demographic Register), and using a qualified remote electronic signature. The camera is not used for any other purpose. By this consent, you confirm such actions.
Give Diia one-time access to geolocation?

Give the Diia access to your geolocation to confirm your location. In this way, Diia will verify the validity of the address specified as the current one. The geolocation will not be used for any other purpose.

string.name: location_permission_rationale_title
string.u: Read more about access to geolocation here

resources.string: The action can request access to geolocation to verify the validity of the address specified as the current one. IMPORTANT!!! Geolocation will not be used for any other purpose.
Would you like to receive push notifications from Diia?

To make it easier to receive government services in Diia, grant permission to send push notifications. The app will notify you of fines, court hearings and decisions, credit history requests, new wholesale orders, and the status of ordered services.
You are already logged in to the app.
To authorize using another method, you must first log out.
Give Diia access to file storage
This is necessary to save receipts, declarations, and statements, as well as to attach photos when creating petitions.

string.name: file_permission_rationale_title
string.u: Read more about access to storage

resources.string: Grant Diia access to an external file storage. This is necessary to store copies of documents confirming the provision of electronic services, as well as to upload photos when creating electronic petitions to local authorities. We use this access only for these purposes and do not share it with anyone without your consent. You hereby authorize us to do so.
You will enter this code to log in to the Diia app.
You will enter this code to sign documents using Diia.Sign.
Make sure you didn\'t make a mistake and remember your login code.
Make sure you didn\'t make a mistake and remember the code for Diia.Sign.
To make sure that it is you who is changing the login code
I don\'t remember the login code
I don\'t remember the code for Diia.Sign
Try to verify your identity through your online banking

A new register of driver's licenses was created in 2013. Out of 9.5 million holders of driver's licenses, only 2.5 million had their photos displayed.

Our IT team managed to obtain high-quality data from the demographic register and enabled 6 million Ukrainians to receive electronic documents.

We will continue to do everything possible to ensure that the quality of data and its security in the registers grows every day. If your ID is not displayed, you will receive advice on how to fix it.

A high-quality register of certificates was created only in 2013. Therefore, drivers who purchased a vehicle before 2013 but did not perform other registration actions afterwards (for example, registering a gas installation, changing the color of a car, etc.) may not see their own documents.\n\nIf your vehicle registration certificate is not displayed in the application, you will receive tips on how to fix it.

Click the Read button and hover the photo frame over the code on the back of the document.\n\nThe code is located at the bottom of the document card and contains a set of letters, numbers, "<" signs, and your first and last name in English.
